Text:
This is the way the local shops get their Haribo Gummy goods, and now you can too. You will never buy the little retail packs again when you realize how HUGE a five-pound bag is for such an incredibly low priced.

With Amazon Prime, every time my son (a Gummy Frog ADDICT) does something kudos-worthy, it's virtually an overnight process -- and not much more expensive -- to say "Good going on acing your finals" in a much more highly-appreciated way than with just a card.
